page.title: 15A SUMMARY OF OUR AREA
page.content: { {Westhoughton}is a small town in{Bolton {Metropolitan District}with a{ {population}of 23,000_24,000.Our area is the most{densely-populated}part of the town,with a large{council housing {estate},consisting of semi-detached and terraced houses.This estate is about{30 years old }(1955).Washacre C.P.School is on this estate and has been open 6 years.The rest of the housing is{privately-owned},consisting of terraced,semi-detached,small detached,and larger detached houses.The houses range from 6 years old to 80 years old. There is a small{shopping area} centred around Market Street,where most day to day goods can be bought.For{luxury goods}people have to travel to larger towns like{Bolton or {Manchester}.
